EmailTemplate.name: 3 - Listings RE
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Retaining clients isn't enough!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Informalname__c},
I just left you a message detailing how I can help gain high-profile listings using some of Five Star Professional's tools.
I've helped some of the top-producing professionals in {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Market_City__c} use Five Star's services to gain new business. I also specialize in helping my clients differentiate themselves and maximize referrals.
2015 Five Star {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Profession_c} Award Guide
Thoughts?
{!User.Name}
Account Manager Five Star Professional
2900 Lone Oak Parkway
Suite 120, Eagan, MN 55121
Direct: {!User.Phone}
